text: The 1933 Southern Conference Men's Basketball Tournament took place from February 24–27, 1933 at Thompson Gym in Raleigh, North Carolina. The South Carolina Gamecocks won their first Southern Conference title, led by head coach Billy Laval.Southern Conference Tournament Results. p. 7-8. Retrieved October 31, 2014. ==Format== The top eight finishers of the conference's ten members were eligible for the tournament. Teams were seeded based on conference winning percentage. The tournament used a preset bracket consisting of three rounds. ==Bracket== * Overtime game ==See also== *List of Southern Conference men's basketball champions ==References== Category:1932–33 Southern Conference men's basketball season Category:Southern Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
title: 1933 Southern Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
